name: Archon of Redemption
resistance: radiant; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Angelic Weapons
traits.desc: The archon’s weapon attacks are magical. When the archon hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 3d8 radiant damage (included in the attack).

traits.name: Axiomatic Mind
traits.desc: The archon can’t be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its understanding of justice.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The archon’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). The archon can innately cast the following spells, requiring only verbal components: * At will: detect evil and good * 1/day each: destructive wave, geas

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The archon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: One Being
traits.desc: Though it appears as a humanoid creature riding a mount, an archon is a single being. The “rider” can’t be dismounted, and no other means can separate the two portions of the archon’s being short of its death.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The archon makes two attacks: one with its sword and one with its claws.

actions.name: Sword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) radiant damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) radiant damage.
